Summary: Black sharp triangle with 3 bright white light at corner and 1 red lights at center
trends: There have been no other sightings in Luxembourg
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsdate : 1st february 2012 evening environ 20:30 location : from my car on motorway a6 luxembourg country , driving from west to east at average speed 110 km\hour about 1 kilometer before "croix de gasperich" (motorway crossing), and about 1 kilometer south of luxembourg city. weather : frozen (environ -5���c) dark blue crystal clear sky ufo : sharp (no rounded border of any kind) equilateral triangle, no tail, deep black color (clear shape, very visible due to backgrounded dark blue sky ) 3 average sized white lights (would say 1\20th of triangle width) , 1 per triangle corner but not at the corner end. 1 average sized red light at the center (quite same size as the 3 white lights) i would say 2 (or more?) small sized (can't determine the size) blinking white light near the center triangle side length is at least 100 meters. ufo flight very low altitude (environ 150 meters above ground) flying straight from south to north going right above luxembourg city (illegal way path for conventional airplane ) the object was almost right above me. (object sight started at environ 45��� angle from horizon front of me) the closest airport (luxembourg airport) low altitude airway is oriented south-west to north-east. the ufo speed was quite slow (environ 1 triangle side length every 2 seconds : environ 50m\s ) i didn't notice any particular sound (no noticable sound from inner car on motorway) notice it presence due to its low altitude, south north direction to city (illegal), and shape loosing it sighting due to motor way bring me to the south (then lost sighting) collateral : i often use this motorway at about same time (every working day evening) i often see planes (a320 alike) the evening ,due the airport just few kilometers away.
